data.title: 300 Switzerland Instagram Captions With Icons
data.meta_description: Here is a collection of Switzerland Instagram captions that you can use for your own posts, together with suitable icons!
data.text:
We are always on the scout for new, inspiring and fun Switzerland instagram captions, and so weâ€™ve gathered a long list for sharing with you. These have been generated and checked by us, and weâ€™ve added some information on each topic below too. Weâ€™ve also included some internal links, where you can check more on the topic where the caption is related to, such as hiking, Swiss food, a specific city and more.

We hope these captions inspire you for sharing your next photo or video about Switzerland!

Switzerland Instagram Captions

20 Switzerland Instagram Captions About Hiking

We are avid hikers, especially since moving to Switzerland during the Summer. There are so many routes to choose from, with or without waterfalls, from different levels of difficulty and different lengths in distance. We have lots of Ticino hiking routes to inspire you, but check out also local hiking routes when visiting. There are routes for everyone!

Itâ€™s a good international city with a wide range of restaurants, good shopping locations, nature parks and places to relax. We last visited a local Cat Cafe in Zurich too!

20 Switzerland Instagram Captions About Lucerne

Lucerne holds a special place in our hearts, being a small but beautiful destination that all should visit at least once in their life time. They have many special events throughout the year, as well as the ideal location for a shopping day. Lucerne is also a great place for sleeping when exploring more of Switzerland, such as to the peak of Mount Pilatus!

St. Gallen is the place to be for a enjoyable weekend city trip. There are many styles of architecture to be admired here, such as with the local Abbey. Many buildings in the old town, which is easily walkable, have decorative bay windows that are very pretty!

20 Switzerland Instagram Captions About Geneva

Geneva, as you may already know, is surrounded by the Alps and Jura mountains located on the west of Switzerland. Close to France, the city is home to the Headquarters of Europeâ€™s United Nations and the Red Cross, as well as it being a global hub for diplomacy and banking. Lac Leman is perfect for a boat tour from Geneva when itâ€™s hot and sunny!

20 Switzerland Instagram Captions About The Alps

The Swiss Alps is a beauty that everyone needs to see, hike and explore at least once. Whether in the snow, such as visiting Zermatt in Winter, or in the Summer, there are lotâ€™s of hikes for all levels. If you donâ€™t want to hike, choose a random gondola and youâ€™ll likely have the best views with a restaurant at the top for relaxing at. Thereâ€™s no better place for a local beer than at the peak of a Swiss mountain. Check here some of the The Best Scenic Viewpoints In Switzerland!

20 Switzerland Instagram Captions About Swiss Trains

Travelling by train in Switzerland is always a good, sustainable and scenic option. The local trains between cities are always on time, and usually have clean windows for the view! There are also a few special trains to reach destinations, such as the well known Gornergrat train in Zermatt and the GoldenPass Railway (highly recommended!).

Below are 20 instagram captions about Swiss trains in Switzerland:
